item.title: The SOBER Manifesto
item.description:
Stability is a System.

At SOBER, we believe that engineering excellence is a byproduct of discipline. We apply the same rigor to our infrastructure that we apply to our lives.

Our Pillars:

  1. Compliant: Governance by design.
  2. Composable: Modular, versioned infrastructure.
  3. Cloud-agnostic: Ownership of your technical destiny.
  4. Observable: If it isn’t measured, it doesn’t exist.

item.title: What We Deliver
item.description:
Strategic Solutions for Growth-Stage Startups

1. Zero-Friction Developer Onboarding

We reduce time-to-contribution from weeks to hours by implementing unified, Nix-based development environments.

2. Audit-Ready Compliance

We bake security into your CI/CD pipelines, making SOC2 or ISO compliance a byproduct of our engineering, not a separate project.

3. Resilience & Disaster Recovery

We build composable, cloud-agnostic systems that can be redeployed in minutes, protecting your business from regional outages.
